    #include<stdio.h>
    int main()
    {
        int a,b,c,i;
        scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
        while(a||b)
        {
                 c=a+b;
                 b=a>b?a:(b);
                 i=0;
                 while(b)
                 {
                         if(b%10>(c%10)) 
                         i++;
                         b=b/10;
                         c=c/10;
                 }
                 if(i==0)
                 printf("No carry operation.\n");
                 else if(i==1)
                 printf("1 carry operation.\n");
                 else
                 printf("%d carry operations.\n",i);
                 scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
        }
        return 0;
    }
